VR & AR trainings

Employee training is costly, blocks the production and is potentially harmful. Replace it with a safe, didactic and cost-effective alternative.

We can:
  • Transform current trainings to VR and/or AR thereby limitng costs and maximizing safety.
  • Create new trainings, with possibility of a multi-user platform.
  • Make 360 tours that can be used in familiarisation processes.

Our projects

Zero Killed

The new generation of battle

A multiplayer tactical VR shooter. Featuring movement without teleportation, interesting futuristic combat gadgets and full use of Virtual Reality technologies for maximum immersion. A project where we travelled through the entire development process: from production to release in the store.

Agony

VR porting project - in progress

One of the darkest survival-horror games of recent years. Immerse in the world of hellish fires, demons and eternal suffering. The game will become even darker, more dynamic, and the groans of the suffering and demonic voices will fill the space around you.

BUM Simulator

VR porting project - in progress

We are developing a VR version of one of the most famous and promising titles. As a player, you will use your actual head, body and arm movements to interact with the world around you to feel as if you were part of this environment.

Education VR

Immersive learning

Education is a significant part of our business. We believe that VR technology positively influences the quality of practical skills developed by students, thanks to which they can be better prepared for professional life.

VR Rollercoasters

A wild ride in your own home

Put on your VR headset and jump on a wicked ride! We are the pioneers of the rollercoaster market, with some of our best productions being recently remastered for better compatibility and higher-quality experience.

Drone Hunter

An alien fleet is approaching the earth!

Released in 2016 on Steam, Drone Hunter VR marks our debut in VR game market.
The game has been later released on Gear VR platform, where it received many positive reviews.

Shovroom

Hassle-free product presentation

Using Shovroom, you can place the objects you desire in a virtual environment, making it an excellent solution for trade events, where logistics can be costly and cumbersome.

Cadillac 360 & AR

Experience the luxury car before you buy it.

A hybrid creation mixing CGI and real 360 video, and an interactive AR presentation to go along with it. The 360 video offers a virtual ride in Barcelona onboard Cadillac CT6 in VR, and in AR you can configure and visualise your future car.

Magic Mirror

Interactive mirror into the virtual world

An advanced system used to attract people to your booth, or an event. It's a digital mirror, which can place virtual objects on bodies of the passerby - like themed hats, uniforms etc.
